3.1.1.name: Precipitation 3.1 Toyger (3.1.1)
3.1.1.changes:
Fix DM commands
Fix Swap!
Remove deprecated methods (WIP, release soon)

3.1.name: Precipitation 3.1 Toyger
3.1.changes:
States & Cities (using a database)
Argumentative help
Drop-down menu in `help`
`help` now shows the command version and required permissions (for user and bot)
Names can no longer be more than one line
Birthdays don't have to have a year anymore
Enabling and disabling commands within a server is now possible
All embeds show Precipitation's icon again (& more fixes!)

Viewing the directory of the `index.js` file is now possible within Precipitation's console
The top bar now changes color based on `host.color`
`shutdown` now has an associated Discord command
`load` and `unload` are now implemented as Discord commands

3.0.name: Precipitation 3.0 Shorthair
3.0.changes:
US and Canada states/provinces are added
Timezones!
Fraud Swap! mode
Beta The Migration
Fixes

2.1.name: Precipitation 2.1 Manx
2.1.changes:
RNG list
Now wishes happy birthday on your birthday!
Location officially added, with all countries recognized

2.0.1.name: Precipitation 2.0.1 Abyssinian
2.0.1.changes:
Fraud lobby optimization
Links will no longer make the command run twice

2.0.name: Precipitation 2.0 Abyssinian
2.0.changes:
New improved command handler
Switch branches!
Buttons for some commands
Edit command handler
Legacy versions viewable through `pr:ver`
Editing messages no longer appears in the message logging channel
More slash commands (`/corrupt` and `/sinfo` now exist)

1.3.name: Precipitation 1.3 Ocicat
1.3.changes:
New `corrupt` command
Fraud! Trick your friends :)

1.2.name: Precipitation 1.2 Burmilla
1.2.changes:
DMing the bot now works
`pic` and `sinfo` commands
All embeds now show the Precipitation logo in the bottom left

1.1.1.name: Precipitation 1.1.1 Cymric
1.1.1.changes: Fixed minor bug where uninitialized guilds would throw an error

1.1.name: Precipitation 1.1 Cymric
1.1.changes:
Better integration between the different builds
Roll and Bleed invite links
Message and member logging
Many bug fixes

1.0.2.name: Precipitation 1.0.2 Blue
1.0.2.changes: Fixed ``[object Object]`` showing rather than the version number when using `pr:config`

1.0.1.name: Precipitation 1.0.1 Blue
1.0.1.changes: Fixed a bug where `rm` would delete no messages if any messages were 2 weeks or older (Discord limitation - deletes the messages that are newer than 2 weeks)

1.0.name: Precipitation 1.0 Blue
1.0.changes: About command links, shows next release, inital bot release

v0.5.0 b3.0.name: Precipitation v0.5.0 b3.0
v0.5.0 b3.0.changes: - all commands (except help and find) are slash commands

v0.5.0 b2.0.name: Precipitation v0.5.0 b2.0
v0.5.0 b2.0.changes: - all General (except help) are slash commands (modular too)

v0.4.0 b5.2.name: Precipitation v0.4.0 b5.2
v0.4.0 b5.2.changes:
- `uinfo` now reports dates in UTC time
- console stuff

v0.02.name: Precipitation v0.02: the robot revolution.
v0.02.changes:
- about command
- detailed ping (message editing, ms timer)

v0.01.name: Precipitation v0.01: the robot revolution.
v0.01.changes:
- the bot can start
- ping, help, ver commands

changes.3.1.1:
Fix DM commands
Fix Swap!
Remove deprecated methods (WIP, release soon)
changes.3.1.0:
States & Cities (using a database)
Argumentative help
Drop-down menu in `help`
`help` now shows the command version and required permissions (for user and bot)
Names can no longer be more than one line
Birthdays don't have to have a year anymore
Enabling and disabling commands within a server is now possible
All embeds show Precipitation's icon again (& more fixes!)

Viewing the directory of the `index.js` file is now possible within Precipitation's console
The top bar now changes color based on `host.color`
`shutdown` now has an associated Discord command
`load` and `unload` are now implemented as Discord commands

changes.3.0.0:
US and Canada states/provinces are added
Timezones!
Fraud Swap! mode
Beta The Migration
Fixes

changes.2.1.0:
RNG list
Now wishes happy birthday on your birthday!
Location officially added, with all countries recognized

changes.2.0.0:
New improved command handler
Switch branches!
Buttons for some commands
Edit command handler
Legacy versions viewable through `pr:ver`
Editing messages no longer appears in the message logging channel
More slash commands (`/corrupt` and `/sinfo` now exist)
changes.2.0.1:
Fraud lobby optimization
Links will no longer make the command run twice

changes.1.3.0:
New `corrupt` command
Fraud! Trick your friends :)

changes.1.2.0:
DMing the bot now works
`pic` and `sinfo` commands
All embeds now show the Precipitation logo in the bottom left

changes.1.1.0:
Better integration between the different builds
Roll and Bleed invite links
Message and member logging
Many bug fixes
changes.1.1.1: Fixed minor bug where uninitialized guilds would throw an error

changes.1.0.0: About command links, shows next release, inital bot release
changes.1.0.1: Fixed a bug where `rm` would delete no messages if any messages were 2 weeks or older (Discord limitation - deletes the messages that are newer than 2 weeks)
changes.1.0.2: Fixed ``[object Object]`` showing rather than the version number when using `pr:config`

changes.0.9.0: `pr:insult` easter egg and more ping messages (more likely, unknown)

changes.v0.01:
- the bot can start
- ping, help, ver commands
changes.v0.02:
- about command
- detailed ping (message editing, ms timer)
changes.v0.0.2.1:
**This version was made available after the release of v0.1, as a result of old version support methods.**
- switch to semi-semantic versioning
- playing status
- warning messages when attempting to run a command from the latest version
changes.v0.0.2.2:
**This version was made available after the release of v0.1, as a result of old version support methods.**
- ping now displays username
-placevalue (probably useless, but if v0.1 is going to have it, we should too)
- console colors!
- console commands
- debugging commands (nothing that can identify someone though! no database!!)
- command parameters
- commands can now be executed in uppercase
